sentences.en: A new syntan product prepared with tar phenol and lignin sulfonic acid.
sentences.cn: 以工业副产物木素磺酸和焦油酚为主要原料研制出一种新的合成鞣剂.

sentences.en: Frequently UNIX files are archived and compressed and have names such as blurfle. tar. Z.
sentences.cn: 通常被归档和压缩的UNIX文件有象blurfle. tar. z这样的名字.

sentences.en: Lignite oil is creosote derived from lignite tar.
sentences.cn: 褐煤油是从褐煤中得来的防腐油.

sentences.en: Peat tar has similar properties to the tar derived from the destructive distillation of wood.
sentences.cn: 泥煤焦油的性质和由木材干馏所得到的焦油的性质相似.

sentences.en: Shipbuilders caulk wooden boats with oakum and tar.
sentences.cn: 造船工匠用麻丝和沥青填塞木船缝隙,使之不渗水.

sentences.en: Tar is a binder for gravel in paving.
sentences.cn: 在铺路时柏油用来粘结砾石.

sentences.en: Tar is used especially for making roads.
The chemist reported on his experiments with coal tar.
sentences.cn: 化学家提出他实验沥青的报告.

sentences.en: The oil has hardened to tar.
The pipe is caked with tar.
The pit cover should be sealed over with tar paper or plastic.
sentences.cn: 顶盖必须用焦油纸或塑料封闭.

sentences.en: The roof was covered with tar.
They drove across the river to New Hampshire on a hot tar road.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着一条滚烫的柏油路开过了河，来到新罕布什尔州。

sentences.en: They told me you dug up two bodies covered in tar?
sentences.cn: 他们告诉我你挖出了两具被柏油包着的尸体?

sentences.en: We use tar to make roads.

phrases.phrase: beat (或 whale) the tar out of
phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)狠狠地揍（或鞭打）
沥青；煤焦油沥青；硬煤沥青
严厉地和带毁灭性地批评；狠批

phrases.phrase: tar people with the same brush
phrases.tran_cn: 认为一类人有同样的缺点

trans.tran_cn: 焦油，沥青，柏油，尼古丁，<口>水手，水兵
trans.tran_en: a black substance, thick and sticky when hot but hard when cold, used especially for making road surfaces

trans.tran_cn: 以焦油或沥青覆盖或涂抹（某物）
